commands



C_COMMAND_MAX

#define C_COMMAND_MAX 64
type: C preprocessor definition
description: maximum number of commands in interpreter

C_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND

#define C_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND -0xff
type: C preprocessor definition
description: command not found error code

C_COMMAND_NULL

#define C_COMMAND_NULL { "", "", "", NULL }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: NULL command initialization

command_func

typedef int (*command_func)(int, char**);
type: C typedef
description: command function type

Command

typedef struct {
  char         name[32];
  char         args[128];
  char         description[256];
  command_func function;
} Command;
type: C struct
description: command struct

gc_command_null

extern const Command gc_command_null;
type: C variable
description: NULL command

CommandArray

typedef Command CommandArray[C_COMMAND_MAX];
type: C typedef
description: array of command

c_command_execute

int  c_command_execute(CommandArray commands, int argc, char *argv[]);
type: C function
description: run arguments through interpreter

c_command_print

void c_command_print(CommandArray commnands);
type: C function
description: print commands name & arguments

Args

typedef struct {
  uint  argc;
  cstr *argv;
} Args;
type: C struct
description: dynamic arguments data

c_args_parse

Args c_args_parse(const char *text);
type: C function

c_args_clear

void c_args_clear(Args args);
type: C function
